description: This file defines a React component for displaying candidate matches in an employer dashboard. It fetches and renders a list of matched candidates based on job ID and minimum score criteria, and includes UI elements like input fields and buttons.

methods.name: MatchesContent
methods.description: Main React component that handles fetching and displaying candidate matches.

methods.name: fetchMatches
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch match data from API and handle loading and error states.
